GSD.description:
hamradio: improve the incomplete fix to avoid NPD

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.12 by commit 03d00f7f1815ec00dab5035851b3de83afd054a8. For more details please see the references link.
